oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee Valley Authority Land Purchasing Office
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Tennessee Valley Authority Land Purchasing Office, used as a location prop for the motion picture, WILD RIVER; 1959.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: RG 82, Department of Conservation Photograph Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Motion pictures; Administrative agencies; Studio props
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
